Pre-Game Insights: Suryakumar Yadav, who has taken over the T20I captaincy from Rohit Sharma, will lead India in this series.
Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal are expected to anchor the batting lineup, offering Yadav a chance to reshape the team’s dynamics.
Charith Asalanka has been appointed as the new T20I captain of Sri Lanka.
The choice between Rishabh Pant and Sanju Samson for the wicketkeeper-batter role is a significant one for India’s new head coach, Gautam Gambhir.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The weather in Pallekele for the series opener is expected to be cloudy and humid on Saturday, with a high probability of thunderstorms, according to AccuWeather.
The pitch at Pallekele traditionally favors batsmen, particularly in the evening when the ball travels more easily off the bat, according to news reports.
The presence of dew in evening matches often makes chasing a preferred option due to the added difficulty in bowling later in the game.
